attributes.action: Keir starmer should step down as Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: I believe we have been lied to by the Labour Party leadership and they haven’t done anything that they set out in there manifesto, they are con artist
attributes.background: Re elect a new prime minister

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for elected representatives to resign, step down, or be removed from office, including the Prime Minister.
